name: Shall we date?: Modern Cinderella
storyline:
You have been given everything.
Friends and families are always there to support you.
Only you know the truth behind your seemingly carefree life.
When your life drives you crazy, you decide to run out of the house.
Now is your chance to start all over...!
“This is the moment I change myself. Let me show you who I really am!”
New friends and new experience help you grow as a person.
The pursuit of happiness begins here!
summary: Modern Cinderella is a dating simulation game developed and published by NTT Solmare. The game was released on Apple and Android devices worldwide on 18 April 2017.
